title: Zayn Malik is nowhere to be seen at sister Safaa's wedding in unseen snaps from big day
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Zayn Malik's 17-year-old sister has shared unseen snaps from her wedding day and bridal party, but the singer is nowhere to be seen.

Safaa has broken her silence on social media following the big day last month, but her older brother, 26, is not in the pictures.

She married boyfriend Martin Tiser in a traditional Nikkah ceremony on September 16 in their home city of Bradford, before she disappeared off social media.

But Safaa has made a return to show off behind-the-scenes snaps of her special day.

As part of her comeback, Safaa created a new account on Sunday which included unseen photos and videos of family and friends.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Zayn's younger sister looked gorgeous as she married her boyfriend, wearing a red lehenga with gold detailing in the pictures.

Her Instagram story boasts photos of their handmade two-tier wedding cake decorated with red roses and diamond wedding bands, as well as photos and videos with her family and friends at the ceremony.

(Image: Instagram)

Her mum Trisha previously shared some heartfelt snaps of the newlyweds with the caption, "My baby girls big day".

And Zayn's dad Yaser and sisters Donia and Waliyha attended the wedding, but the former One Direction star wasn't present.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

But his ex girlfriend Gigi Hadid showed support by liking the post of Safaa.

The new bride shared a photo of her henna inked hand and beautiful new ring, as well as snaps in the run up to the wedding.

Her family recently hit out after trolls as they claimed his sister Safaa was too young to marry.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

The singer's other sister Waliyha shut down keyboard warriors in a scathing response after people aired their concerns about Safaa being 17.

Waliyha penned next to a set of photos: "Congratulations to my beautiful baby sister and the best little brother in law on your Nikkah. ❤️love you."
description: Zayn Malik's younger sister has broken her silence since her wedding with unseen snaps - but he isn't in them
